And if his oblation<S>7133</S> be a sacrifice<S>2077</S> of peace offering<S>8002</S>, if he offer<S>7126</S> it of the herd<S>1241</S>; whether it be a male<S>2145</S> or female<S>5347</S>, he shall offer<S>7126</S> it without blemish<S>8549</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And he shall lay<S>5564</S> his hand<S>3027</S> upon the head<S>7218</S> of his offering<S>7133</S>, and kill<S>7819</S> it at the door<S>6607</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>: and Aaron's<S>175</S> sons<S>1121</S> the priests<S>3548</S> shall sprinkle<S>2236</S> the blood<S>1818</S> upon the altar<S>4196</S> round about<S>5439</S>.
And he shall offer<S>7126</S> of the sacrifice<S>2077</S> of the peace offering<S>8002</S> an offering made by fire<S>801</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>; the fat<S>2459</S> that covereth<S>3680</S> the inwards<S>7130</S>, and all the fat<S>2459</S> that is upon the inwards<S>7130</S>, <sup>fat: or, suet</sup>
And the two<S>8147</S> kidneys<S>3629</S>, and the fat<S>2459</S> that is on them, which is by the flanks<S>3689</S>, and the caul<S>3508</S> above the liver<S>3516</S>, with the kidneys<S>3629</S>, it shall he take away<S>5493</S>. <sup>caul: or, midriff over the liver, and over the kidneys</sup>
And Aaron's<S>175</S> sons<S>1121</S> shall burn<S>6999</S> it on the altar<S>4196</S> upon the burnt sacrifice<S>5930</S>, which is upon the wood<S>6086</S> that is on the fire<S>784</S>: it is an offering made by fire<S>801</S>, of a sweet<S>5207</S> savour<S>7381</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And if his offering<S>7133</S> for a sacrifice<S>2077</S> of peace offering<S>8002</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> be of the flock<S>6629</S>; male<S>2145</S> or female<S>5347</S>, he shall offer<S>7126</S> it without blemish<S>8549</S>.
If he offer<S>7126</S> a lamb<S>3775</S> for his offering<S>7133</S>, then shall he offer<S>7126</S> it before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And he shall lay<S>5564</S> his hand<S>3027</S> upon the head<S>7218</S> of his offering<S>7133</S>, and kill<S>7819</S> it before<S>6440</S> the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>: and Aaron's<S>175</S> sons<S>1121</S> shall sprinkle<S>2236</S> the blood<S>1818</S> thereof round about<S>5439</S> upon the altar<S>4196</S>.
And he shall offer<S>7126</S> of the sacrifice<S>2077</S> of the peace offering<S>8002</S> an offering made by fire<S>801</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>; the fat<S>2459</S> thereof, and the whole<S>8549</S> rump<S>451</S>, it shall he take off<S>5493</S> hard<S>5980</S> by the backbone<S>6096</S>; and the fat<S>2459</S> that covereth<S>3680</S> the inwards<S>7130</S>, and all the fat<S>2459</S> that is upon the inwards<S>7130</S>,
And the two<S>8147</S> kidneys<S>3629</S>, and the fat<S>2459</S> that is upon them, which is by the flanks<S>3689</S>, and the caul<S>3508</S> above the liver<S>3516</S>, with the kidneys<S>3629</S>, it shall he take away<S>5493</S>.
And the priest<S>3548</S> shall burn<S>6999</S> it upon the altar<S>4196</S>: it is the food<S>3899</S> of the offering made by fire<S>801</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And if his offering<S>7133</S> be a goat<S>5795</S>, then he shall offer<S>7126</S> it before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And he shall lay<S>5564</S> his hand<S>3027</S> upon the head<S>7218</S> of it, and kill<S>7819</S> it before<S>6440</S> the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>: and the sons<S>1121</S> of Aaron<S>175</S> shall sprinkle<S>2236</S> the blood<S>1818</S> thereof upon the altar<S>4196</S> round about<S>5439</S>.
And he shall offer<S>7126</S> thereof his offering<S>7133</S>, even an offering made by fire<S>801</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>; the fat<S>2459</S> that covereth<S>3680</S> the inwards<S>7130</S>, and all the fat<S>2459</S> that is upon the inwards<S>7130</S>,
And the two<S>8147</S> kidneys<S>3629</S>, and the fat<S>2459</S> that is upon them, which is by the flanks<S>3689</S>, and the caul<S>3508</S> above the liver<S>3516</S>, with the kidneys<S>3629</S>, it shall he take away<S>5493</S>.
And the priest<S>3548</S> shall burn<S>6999</S> them upon the altar<S>4196</S>: it is the food<S>3899</S> of the offering made by fire<S>801</S> for a sweet<S>5207</S> savour<S>7381</S>: all the fat<S>2459</S> is the LORD'S<S>3068</S>.
It shall be a perpetual<S>5769</S> statute<S>2708</S> for your generations<S>1755</S> throughout all your dwellings<S>4186</S>, that ye eat<S>398</S> neither fat<S>2459</S> nor blood<S>1818</S>.
